title: An Affair to Remember
description: Long time friends of ours and frequent contributors Patrick Stevenson and Jason Connor join us to plug their new podcast The Motor Affair.  Given all of our familiarity we veer off track rather quickly but the product is predictablly riidiculous and entertaining.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: Long time friends of ours and frequent contributors Patrick Stevenson and Jason Connor join us to plug their new podcast The Motor Affair.  Given all of our familiarity we veer off track rather quickly but the product is predictablly riidiculous and entertaining.
